0.comment: exciting, sensational, beautiful and engaging. I will certainly buy the sequel

2.comment: overall nice, I expected something more but in general I can be satisfied with my purchase

3.comment: inconsistent, poorly written, non-engaging story. Having read the previous volumes I must say that this left me very bitter in my mouth. I hope it was a false step and that the next stories will return to the level of those previous ones
honestly I was expecting something more
very bad, full of plot holes. It left me very dissatisfied

7.comment: honestly I didn't think that after the conclusion of the saga this new adventure could be at the level of the previous ones. I had to change my mind. Really nice. Congratulations!
Spettacolare, impressionante. Non pensavo che mi avrebbe appassionato come i libri della precedente saga
